QuestData.Title: Spirit of Rhunok
QuestData.Description: My feelings tell me that Rhunok doesn't have much time.$B$BI can tell that the arctic bear god's spirit has already separated from his weakened body. It is his spirit with which you must commune.$B$BHis altar lies to the northwest beyond Drak'Mabwa.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the Spirit of Rhunok at the Altar of Rhunok.
QuestData.RewardText: I am barely hanging on. You must work quickly or all will be lost.
